Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a range of features that make it invaluable for its intended use. Given its quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than $80 to anyone who appreciates excellence. Considering its unique benefits and high standards, I kindly propose a price of $120 for this product. I look forward to your consideration and hope you'll find the value proposition compelling. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time and interest. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
